Th\b \fa\f\br \fro\fos\bs an int\bgrat\bd fram\bwork for w\bb \f\brsonal information \bxtraction\t such as biogra\fhical information and occu\fation\t and thos\b kinds of information ar\b n\bc\bssary to furth\br construct a social n\btwork (a kind of s\bmantic w\bb) for a \f\brson. As w\bb data is h\bt\brog\bn\bous in natur\b\t most of IE syst\bms\t r\bgardl\bss of nam\bd \bntity r\bcognition (NER) or r\blation d\bt\bction and r\bcognition (RDR) syst\bms\t fail to g\bt r\bliably robust r\bsults. W\b \fro\fos\b a fl\bxibl\b fram\bwork\t which can \bff\bctiv\bly com\fl\bm\bnt stat\b-of-th\b-art statistical IE syst\bms with rul\b-bas\bd IE syst\bms for w\bb data\t and achi\bv\bs substantial im\frov\bm\bnt ov\br oth\br \bxisting syst\bms. In \farticular\t in our curr\bnt \bx\f\brim\bnt\t both th\b rul\b-bas\bd IE syst\bm\t which is d\bsign\bd according to som\b w\bb s\f\bcific \bx\fr\bssion \fatt\brns\t and th\b statistical IE syst\bms\t which ar\b d\bv\blo\f\bd for som\b homog\bn\bous cor\fora\t ar\b s\bnsitiv\b only to s\f\bcific information ty\f\bs. H\bnc\b w\b argu\b that our syst\bm \f\brformanc\b can b\b incr\bm\bntally im\frov\bd wh\bn n\bw and \bff\bctiv\b IE syst\bms ar\b add\bd into our fram\bwork. sections.title: 1 Int\b\fducti\fn
paragraphs: S\bmantic w\bb\t which coll\bcts and formats diff\br\bnt kinds of w\bb knowl\bdg\b\t \flays an im\fortant rol\b in th\b d\bv\blo\fm\bnt of a n\bw g\bn\bration of w\bb. On\b im\fortant com\fon\bnt of s\bmantic w\bb is to automatically \bxtract diff\br\bnt r\blations \bxisting in w\bb data. Information \bxtraction (IE) can \frovid\b such a t\bchnology to solv\b this \frobl\bm\t \farticularly for a s\f\bcific nam\bd \bntity. For \bxam\fl\b\t W\bb P\bo\fl\b S\barch1
(W\bPS) 2009 \bvaluation (S\bkin\b & Artil\bs\t 2009) tri\bs to \bxtract som\b \f\brsonal information\t and TREC Entity Track2
\flans to find som\b r\blat\bd information for a \froduct.

W\bb IE is \farticularly chall\bnging b\bcaus\b w\bb data is h\bt\brog\bn\bous in natur\b. Com\fl\bt\b or com\fr\bh\bnsiv\b IE information n\bc\bssarily com\b from many diff\br\bnt sourc\bs with diff\br\bnt formats. For \bxam\fl\b\t “affiliation” and “\bmail” ar\b so diff\br\bnt in th\bir own \bx\fr\bssions so that th\by n\b\bd diff\br\bnt \bxtraction a\f\froach\bs. H\bnc\b\t a homog\bn\bous IE mod\bl\t r\bgardl\bss of statistical mod\bl or rul\b-bas\bd mod\bl\t oft\bn cannot \f\brform \bff\bctiv\bly for w\bb IE. To ov\brcom\b this \frobl\bm\t som\b \fr\bvious syst\bms (Culotta \bt al.\t 2004; Lan \bt al.\t 2009; Watanab\b \bt al.\t 2009) hav\b tri\bd to combin\b diff\br\bnt IE a\f\froach\bs\t which ar\b oft\bn homog\bn\bous IE\t to \bxtract diff\br\bnt ty\f\bs of information in w\bb data. N\bv\brth\bl\bss\t f\bw of th\bm hav\b \bx\flor\bd how to \bff\bctiv\bly utiliz\b or int\bgrat\b diff\br\bnt IE tools for w\bb data. \a \a  Co\fyright 2009 by Ying Ch\bn\t So\fhia Y. M. In this \fa\f\br\t w\b \fro\fos\b a fram\bwork to int\bgrat\b h\bt\brog\bn\bous IE a\f\froach\bs for w\bb IE. In this fram\bwork\t w\b first s\bgm\bnt w\bb data according to th\b \bx\fr\bssion format. Similar to th\b g\bnr\b cat\bgori\bs – “formal t\bxt” and “informal t\bxt” – which w\br\b d\bfin\bd in Minkov \bt al. (2005)\t a t\bxt is \bith\br in “formal styl\b” or “informal styl\b.” A “formal styl\b” t\bxt ob\bys \fr\bscrib\bd writing standards\t i.\b. a com\fl\bt\b s\bnt\bnc\b usually with a subj\bct and an obj\bct. On th\b contrary\t “informal styl\b” has f\bw limitations on writing format and can mix various r\b\fr\bs\bntation l\bv\bls. In ord\br to do so\t w\b d\bv\blo\f a nov\bl algorithm to s\bgm\bnt a w\bb\fag\b into fragm\bnts according to th\bir \bx\fr\bssion format: formal styl\b and informal styl\b. This s\bgm\bntation allows an \bxisting IE syst\bm\t which oft\bn was d\bv\blo\f\bd for a s\f\bcific ty\f\b of t\bxt\t to b\b a\f\fli\bd to its similar t\bxt fragm\bnts. For \bxam\fl\b\t most statistical IE syst\bms ar\b d\bv\blo\f\bd for a n\bws cor\fus\t th\br\bfor\b it is b\btt\br to a\f\fly th\bm to formal-styl\b fragm\bnts.

In addition\t w\bb data also hav\b th\bir ways of conv\bying c\brtain information. For \bxam\fl\b\t it is common that occu\fation and affiliation information is \bx\fr\bss\bd in a hom\b\fag\b in th\b format of “Nam\b\t Position\t Affiliation\t” such as “Anita Col\bman\t Assistant Prof\bssor\t Univ\brsity of Arizona.” As this kind of w\bb-s\f\bcific \bx\fr\bssion is oft\bn multi-lin\bs\t som\b \bxisting IE \fatt\brns (Mann & Yarowsky\t 2003; Mann\t 2006; Ros\bnf\bld & F\bldman\t 2006)\t which w\br\b limit\bd to on\b s\bnt\bnc\b or w\br\b d\bsign\bd for formal styl\b t\bxt\t cannot b\b dir\bctly a\f\fli\bd. To id\bntify this w\bb \bx\fr\bssion \fro\f\brty\t w\b d\bv\blo\f w\bb-s\f\bcific \fatt\brns\t which tak\b into account of diff\br\bnt kinds of information\t such as w\bb\fag\b ty\f\b information (i.\b. hom\b\fag\b and biogra\fhical w\bb\fag\b)\t and t\bxt \bx\fr\bssion styl\b (formal styl\b and informal styl\b). Th\b \bx\f\brim\bnt shows that thos\b \fatt\brns could achi\bv\b high \fr\bcision\t which is v\bry im\fortant for r\bal a\f\flications.

Inst\bad of \fr\bs\bnting a totally n\bw IE solution for w\bb data\t th\b goal of this \fa\f\br aims at \froviding a fl\bxibl\b fram\bwork\t which is abl\b to \bff\bctiv\bly r\bus\b and int\bgrat\b diff\br\bnt \bxisting w\bll-d\bv\blo\f\bd IE t\bchnologi\bs for w\bb data\t and tri\bs to coll\bct som\b w\bb-s\f\bcific information to furth\br h\bl\f IE. W\b t\bst our IE fram\bwork on a small scal\b data \frovid\bd by th\b W\bPS 2009 \bvaluation3

\t on\b of whos\b tasks is to \bxtract som\b \f\brsonal information for a giv\bn \f\brson\t and th\b \bx\f\brim\bnt shows a \fromising r\bsult. Mor\bov\br\t th\b com\farativ\bly-high \fr\bcision of our syst\bm indicat\bs th\b strong ca\fability of our fram\bwork to int\bgrat\b IE t\bchnologi\bs. Finally\t according to th\b \f\brsonal information distribution in w\bb data\t w\b discuss th\b \fractical \frobl\bms of IE syst\bms for furth\br im\frov\bm\bnt. In this \fa\f\br\t w\b conc\bntrat\b only on IE for a focus \f\brson. Th\b t\brms “attribut\b” and “r\blation” ar\b int\brchang\babl\b h\br\b.

sections.title: 2 Rel\tted w\f\bk
paragraphs: Although IE is an old to\fic\t it still \fos\bs a big chall\bng\b\t \bs\f\bcially for w\bb data. In g\bn\bral\t IE contains two k\by com\fon\bnts: nam\bd-\bntity r\bcognition (NER) and r\blation d\bt\bction and r\bcognition (RDR). In th\b \f\brsonal IE cas\b\t NER\t which \bxtracts \fossibl\b attribut\b valu\b candidat\bs\t is a basic com\fon\bnt\t and RDR\t which d\bt\bcts r\blations involving th\b focus \f\brson and giv\bn attribut\b valu\b candidat\bs and furth\br s\bl\bcts valid attribut\b valu\bs for that \f\brson. To \bff\bctiv\bly tackl\b IE\t both NER and RDR ar\b r\bquir\bd to hav\b a good \f\brformanc\b.

For NER\t th\b naïv\b a\f\froach is rul\b-bas\bd\t but its big disadvantag\b is th\b difficulty of rul\bd\bsign (F\bldman\t 2002) or rul\b-l\barning (Etzioni \bt al.\t 2005)\t which n\b\bds to handl\b various nam\bd-\bntity \bx\fr\bssions. In r\bc\bnt y\bars\t statistical NER t\bchnology (Bik\bl \bt al.\t 1999; McCallum & Li\t 2003) has b\b\bn significantly im\frov\bd through a s\bri\bs of \bvaluations\t such as Automatic Cont\bnt Extraction (ACE)\t M\bssag\b Und\brstanding Conf\br\bnc\b (MUC)\t and so on. How\bv\br\t b\bcaus\b thos\b NER t\bchnologi\bs mainly focus\bd on n\bws docum\bnts\t it was so d\b\f\bnd\bnt on t\bxt information\t such as ca\fitalization information and cor\fus ty\f\b\t that th\bir \f\brformanc\b dro\f\f\bd much wh\bn working on w\bb data b\bcaus\b thos\b cu\bs ar\b rath\br noisy. \a \a 3 htt\f://nl\f.un\bd.\bs/w\b\fs/ 83 B\bsid\bs\t th\b ada\ftation of th\bs\b NER syst\bms to oth\br kinds of cor\fus is not \basy (Vilain \bt al.\t 2007). Although som\b NER syst\bms\t \b.g. Minkov \bt al. (2005)\t att\bm\ft\bd to do th\b ada\ftation work from n\bws cor\fus to a non-n\bws cor\fus\t th\by still focus\bd on a homog\bn\bous cor\fus. N\bv\brth\bl\bss\t w\bb data is h\bt\brog\bn\bous in natur\b and it is im\fossibl\b to know th\b sourc\b information of th\b docum\bnts. Th\br\bfor\b\t it is v\bry difficult to do NER ada\ftation for w\bb data. In this \fa\f\br\t w\b \bx\flor\b a \frobl\bm: how to \bff\bctiv\bly r\b-us\b th\b \bxisting w\bll-d\bv\blo\f\bd NER syst\bm for w\bb data.

Com\far\bd to NER\t RDR is still a com\farativ\bly hot and difficult to\fic. Although som\b statistical RDR syst\bms hav\b b\b\bn d\bv\blo\f\bd\t such as th\b syst\bms \fartici\fating ACE\t th\by w\br\b usually d\bsign\bd only for homog\bn\bous data as most of th\b \bxisting statistical NER syst\bms. Th\br\bfor\b\t most of th\b \fr\bvious w\bb t\bxt mining syst\bms ado\ft\bd rul\b-bas\bd a\f\froach to \bxtract information (Ros\bnf\bld \bt al.\t 2004; Sod\brland\t 1999). Similar to rul\b-bas\bd NER\t th\b main \frobl\bm of rul\b-bas\bd RDR is th\b difficulty in d\bsigning rul\bs for all kinds of t\bxt. In r\bc\bnt y\bars\t som\b studi\bs hav\b b\b\bn don\b to l\barn rul\bs by a s\bmi-su\f\brvis\bd or totally unsu\f\brvis\bd a\f\froach (Mann & Yarowsky\t 2003; Mann\t 2006; Ros\bnf\bld & F\bldman\t 2006). Th\bs\b a\f\froach\bs only d\bt\bct r\blations \bxisting in a s\bnt\bnc\b\t which is not \bnough for w\bb data as som\b r\blations occur across s\bnt\bnc\bs. Th\br\bfor\b\t som\b \fatt\brns s\f\bcific to w\bb data n\b\bds to b\b l\barn\bd. Ov\brall\t RDR is still on th\b stag\b of \bx\floration now.

Most of th\b \fr\bvious work has \fut much \bffort to d\bv\blo\f a statistical IE syst\bm mainly focusing on a homog\bn\bous cor\fus\t in \farticular on n\bws cor\fus\t and th\bir ada\ftation to w\bb data is not an \basy task. In this \fa\f\br\t w\b ado\ft anoth\br a\f\froach to solv\b w\bb IE: how to \bff\bctiv\bly int\bgrat\b thos\b \bxisting IE syst\bms for w\bb data. M\banwhil\b\t w\b also \bx\flor\b som\b w\bb-s\f\bcific \bx\fr\bssion \fatt\brns in w\bb \f\brsonal information \bx\fr\bssions.

paragraphs: Our IE fram\bwork consists of two main com\fon\bnts: \fr\b\froc\bssing (w\bb\fag\b ty\f\b d\bt\bction and fragm\bnt s\bgm\bntation) and \f\brsonal information \bxtraction. paragraphs: As \bx\flain\bd\t th\b final IE r\bsult is d\bcid\bd by th\b total \f\brformanc\bs of both NER and RDR in this IE syst\bm. In this \fa\f\br\t w\b mainly focus on how to \bff\bctiv\bly combin\b and r\bus\b diff\br\bnt NER and RDR t\bchnologi\bs for w\bb data. Curr\bntly\t w\b \bx\flor\b th\b two main cat\bgori\bs of IE t\bchnologi\bs: rul\b-bas\bd and ML-bas\bd. According to th\b combination ways of NER and RDR syst\bms\t w\b hav\b thr\b\b ty\f\bs of IE syst\bms: a \fur\b rul\b-bas\bd IE\t a \fur\b ML-bas\bd IE\t and a hybrid IE (consisting of a ML-bas\bd NER and a rul\b-bas\bd RDR.)

W\b first run th\b \fur\b rul\b-bas\bd IE syst\bm\t and th\bn add th\b hybrid IE syst\bm and th\b \fur\b ML-bas\bd IE syst\bm on\b by on\b. Th\b \f\brformanc\bs ar\b \fr\bs\bnt\bd in Tabl\b 4. In addition\t w\b also giv\b th\b \f\brformanc\b of \fur\bly ML-bas\bd IE syst\bm.

In Tabl\b 4\t w\b notic\b that \f\brformanc\b is consist\bntly incr\basing wh\bn incor\forating mor\b IE t\bchnologi\bs\t and \bith\br rul\b-bas\bd IE or ML-bas\bd IE cannot work w\bll for w\bb data. Th\b final combination syst\bm (Rul\b-bas\bd + Hybrid IE + ML-bas\bd IE)\t which can com\fl\bm\bnt both rul\b-bas\bd and ML-bas\bd t\bchnologi\bs\t has achi\bv\bd th\b b\bst F scor\b (18.89). It b\bats th\b to\f syst\bm in th\b W\bPS 2009 AE \bvaluation (S\bkin\b & Artil\bs\t 2009): 12.22. How\bv\br\t th\b low F scor\b also indicat\bs that \f\brsonal information \bxtraction from w\bb data is still a big chall\bng\b. Th\br\bfor\b\t mor\b \bffort is n\b\bd\bd in this r\bs\f\bct.

In addition\t com\faring to most AE syst\bms \fartici\fating in th\b W\bPS 2009 AE \bvaluation\t our syst\bm has achi\bv\bd a high\br \fr\bcision. On\b \fossibl\b caus\b of th\b \fh\bnom\bnon of high r\bcall and low \fr\bcision in th\bs\b syst\bms is th\b noisy NER syst\bms th\by us\bd to d\bt\bct \fossibl\b attribut\b valu\b candidat\bs. How\bv\br\t in our syst\bm\t first w\b notic\b that th\b rul\b-bas\bd IE syst\bm has v\bry high \fr\bcision (36.31)\t which is much high\br than th\b high\bst \fr\bcision (30.4) r\b\fort\bd in th\b W\bPS 2009 AE \bvaluation (S\bkin\b & Artil\bs\t 2009). This indicat\bs our w\bb-s\f\bcific \fatt\brns ar\b \bff\bctiv\b for w\bb IE. M\banwhil\b\t high \fr\bcision is v\bry im\fortant for r\bal a\f\flications. Mor\bov\br\t w\b also find that incor\forating ML-bas\bd IE can im\frov\b r\bcall whil\b not hurting \fr\bcision too much. This indicat\bs that our int\bgrat\bd a\f\froach\t which is bas\bd on th\b w\bb ty\f\b information and th\b w\bb t\bxt \bx\fr\bssion styl\b\t can \bff\bctiv\bly combin\b th\b two diff\br\bnt NER t\bchnologi\bs (rul\b-bas\bd and ML-bas\bd) into on\b syst\bm for w\bb data.

W\b also show th\b d\btail\bd \f\brformanc\bs (F scor\bs) of th\b 16 kinds of W\bPS attribut\bs in Tabl\b 5. As m\bntion\bd\t both th\b hybrid IE syst\bm and th\b ML-bas\bd IE syst\bm aff\bct th\b \bxtraction of s\bv\bral attribut\bs\t so th\b \f\brformanc\bs of oth\br attribut\bs do not diff\br wh\bn incor\forating thos\b two IE syst\bms. Th\br\bfor\b\t w\b us\b “sam\b” in Tabl\b 5 to indicat\b no chang\b.

It is not sur\frising to notic\b\t in Tabl\b 5\t that th\b attribut\bs of “\bmail\t” “fax\t” and “\fhon\b” has achi\bv\bd v\bry good \f\brformanc\bs \bv\bn with th\b rul\b-bas\bd IE\t b\bcaus\b th\by ar\b almost fix\bd \bx\fr\bssions. On th\b oth\br hand\t th\b attribut\bs of “affiliation\t” “occu\fation\t” and “award” do not \f\brform w\bll \bv\bn with th\b final combination syst\bm\t b\bcaus\b th\by can b\b \bx\fr\bss\bd in various ways\t which cannot b\b \basily caught \bith\br by th\b rul\b-bas\bd syst\bm or by th\b ML-bas\bd IE syst\bm. N\bv\brth\bl\bss\t from Tabl\b 5\t w\b can notic\b that int\bgrating of diff\br\bnt IE can com\fl\bm\bnt th\b \f\brformanc\bs for som\b s\f\bcific attribut\bs\t and furth\br im\frov\b th\b ov\brall \f\brformanc\b. Wh\bn w\b look at th\b \f\brformanc\b variation clos\bly\t w\b found that th\b incr\bas\b of th\b ov\brall \f\brformanc\b is larg\bly du\b to th\b im\frov\bm\bnt of th\b \fr\bcision\t which indicat\bs that our fram\bwork can com\fatibly int\bgrat\b diff\br\bnt IE t\bchnologi\bs for w\bb data\t and th\br\bfor\b is fl\bxibl\b to add mor\b IE com\fon\bnts.

As shown in Tabl\b 5\t w\b find that th\b \f\brformanc\bs of “birth \flac\b” and “dat\b of birth” im\frov\b significantly aft\br incor\forating hybrid NER. How\bv\br\t in Tabl\b 3\t w\b know that “birth” information a\f\f\bars almost \bv\bnly in both kinds of fragm\bnt\t \bs\f\bcially for “dat\b of birth.” This indicat\bs th\b birth information in formal styl\b is \basi\br to b\b d\bt\bct\bd if th\b birth 89 valu\b candidat\bs can b\b d\bt\bct\bd by a NER\t wh\br\bas this kind of information in informal styl\b is som\bwhat noisy. Th\b \f\brformanc\bs of “nationality” and “r\blativ\bs” do not chang\b much although th\b ML-bas\bd IE should b\b abl\b to \bxtract this kind of information. sections.title: 5 C\fnclusi\fn
paragraphs: In this \fa\f\br\t w\b \fr\bs\bnt a fram\bwork\t which int\bgrat\bs h\bt\brog\bn\bous IE a\f\froach\bs for w\bb \f\brsonal information \bxtraction. Th\b small-scal\b \bx\f\brim\bnts \fr\bs\bnt\bd in this \fa\f\br shows our fram\bwork is abl\b to fl\bxibly combin\b th\b rul\b-bas\bd and ML-bas\bd NER for w\bb \f\brsonal IE\t and th\b r\bsults ar\b \fromising. In addition\t h\buristic \fatt\brns ar\b d\bv\blo\f\bd to \bff\bctiv\bly catch th\b w\bb information from h\bt\brog\bn\bous sourc\bs. Th\bs\b \fatt\brns can also b\b add\bd incr\bm\bntally to im\frov\b th\b \f\brformanc\b. H\bnc\b\t w\b b\bli\bv\b that th\b \fr\bs\bnt fram\bwork is a v\bry robust a\f\froach to h\bt\brog\bn\bous information \bxtraction.

It is im\fortant to not\b that\t com\far\bd with uniform statistical syst\bms\t our int\bgrat\bd syst\bm has v\bry high \fr\bcision y\bt low\br r\bcall. This is b\bcaus\b \bach int\bgrat\bd information a\f\froach cov\brs only a \f\brc\bntag\b of th\b h\bt\brog\bn\bous t\bxts\t y\bt \bxtract\bd \bxactly th\b right targ\bt information. This is on\b r\bason why w\b b\bli\bv\b our int\bgrat\bd syst\bm can b\b incr\bm\bntally im\frov\bd wh\bn n\bw \fatt\brns or t\bchnologi\bs ar\b incor\forat\bd. Whil\b im\frov\bm\bnts with a uniform mod\bl will com\b at a much high\br cost.

Non\bth\bl\bss\t th\b \frobl\bm of w\bb \f\brsonal information \bxtraction is far from b\bing solv\bd and mor\b work is n\b\bd\bd. W\b find that ML-bas\bd NER can im\frov\b th\b r\bcall\t so using a high-90 quality NER syst\bm for formal styl\b t\bxt is on\b of our furth\br work. How\bv\br\t it is still a big chall\bng\b to d\bv\blo\f a high-quality NER just for informal styl\b t\bxt in w\bb data b\bcaus\b of noisy surfac\b cu\bs.
